name: Demonrock: War of Ages
description:
Demonrock: War of Ages is a reverse defense game with beautiful 3D graphics and intuitive
game play. Lead your hero's soldiers to victory against hordes of monsters.

Features:

- 40 Levels across 4 unique environments. Forest, Dungeon, Coffin chamber and Winter
forest

- 4 Legendary Heroes: Barbarian, Ranger, Knight and Sorceress, each hero has 5 skills

- Over 30 different enemies and Bosses: Goblins, Orcs, Skeletons, Trolls, Spiders, Werewolves... and...
a Giant Dragon!

- Hire 13 different mercenaries to break through enemies’ defenses

- Collect epic loot in battle and upgrade your weapons and armor. Each hero has 6 weapons and
armors with 4 levels of appearance upgrades

- Intuitive controls and step-by-step tutorials for you to get started
